name.en: Practical Discussion on Net Zero Emission

department.ch: 永續去碳科技碩士學位學程

goal.ch: 本課程將從外部業師角度以全方位的探討企業溫室氣體排放與碳足跡的來源，並從企業角度探討如何從執行科學減碳、內部碳定價、綠電採購與供應鏈減碳。另外，從產品生命週期中以原料的碳排角度出發，如何應用劍橋大學工程設計中心名譽教授Michael F. Ashby所研發之選材策略方法，以經濟、少碳的之選材策略出發，更深入的探討企業材料選用的問題，進而根據材料使用情境工況選用適合之材料。
goal.en: This course will comprehensively discuss corporate greenhouse gas emissions and carbon footprint sources from the viewpoint of external experts and how to execute scientific carbon reduction, internal carbon pricing, green energy procurement, and supply chain carbon reduction from a corporate standpoint. Besides, starting from the perspective of raw materials in a product life cycle, the selection of materials with an economic and low-carbon material selection strategy will further be discussed. The material selection method was developed by Prof. Michael F. Ashby Material Selection Method from Engineering Design Center, University of Cambridge. Finally, the issues of corporate material selection will be explored and then the suitable materials will be selected based on the material usage context in this course.

Week 1 - (09/11) Analyze Global Net Zero Trend
